DOC.brief_summary: Objective : evaluate Neobladder posterior wall suspend round ligament uterus could improve neobladder empty radical cystectomy female patient bladder cancer compare present standard neobladder
DOC.brief_title: Neobladder Posterior Wall Suspended With Round Ligament Uterus After Radical Cystectomy Female With Bladder Cancer â€”a Prospective Control Study
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion study bladder cancer ( Stage T1G3 , T23N0NxM0 ) , female ( age 40 70 year old ) , history urethral trauma urethral stricture ; desire obtain orthotopic neobladder The exclusion criterion male sex , posterior urethral margin confirm cancer invasive pathology ; enteritis . The indication contraindication orthotopic reconstruction study conform criterion set guideline European Association Urology bladder cancer
